participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: outgoing and adventurous, loves outdoor activities and exploring nature.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. i like to go hiking in the spring.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: cheerful and playful, enjoys spending time with friends and has a vivid imagination.
participant_2.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i'm in the third grade.

content.text:
I am little bit shy☺️ 
Tell me about yourself!
I am in the third grade. I love mickey mouse.
I am excited for the weekend. I am going to go to college next year. Do you live in colorado?
I live in colorado, near colorado are you a mechanical engineer?
No, ı am a doctor. And you?
I am a male, but i love to hike and bike riding.
I like to draw and listen to music
I like to play my friends on the ground.
I am a very social person.
